reviewData.reviewNote: 🍾 having the honor to try out a first wine from the new owners of this chateau 🍇 70% grenache, 15% shiraz, 15% rolle 🔍 Completely organic, fermentation at 16°C 👀 pale/medium salmon 👃🏼 minerals chamomile lavender orange blossom 👅 strawberry raspberry minerals peach camomile butter ❤️ 9,5/10. I 💯 like this! Intense nose, long aftertaste. Everything works very well together. Interesting that 👃🏼 is different from 👅 ❗️If too warm > sticks to palate: caramel (🙁). If too cold > 👃🏼 is gone

Arguably the best rosé I have ever tasted. Deeply intense nose of rose petal, strawberry, grapefruit. Wonderful colour, lingering layered taste of red fruit. Long finish 🍇 70% Grenache, 15% Syrah, 15% Rolle 👁 pale intensity, salmon 👃🏻 pronounced intensity, youthful Primary: camomile limestone lavender peach rose petal 👅 dry, high acidity, med alc, med body, pronounced intensity, long finish Primary: peach strawberry raspberry grapefruit Secondary: butter ⚖️ Crisp, pure, intense, exceptional 18/20

Everything a perfect Rosé should be...deliciously smooth with a vibrant and clean finish. Incredibly well priced for the outstanding quality. I love the beautiful packaging as well. This is definitely my ‘Favori’ Rosè...
Ideale apero on indian summer Friday

Heerlijk aromatische rosé: perzik, framboos, wat pompelmoes en een toets (bloemige) kruidigheid (oranjebloesem, lavendel). Vol fruitige smaak met een iets kruidige afdronk die voor een rosé bijzonder lang aan houdt. Topper 👌
Thank you Chateau Favori, you are the only thing keeping me sane during this lockdown, what a joy for your tastebuds, highly recommended!
Un feu d’artifice au nez et à la première attaque. Une longueur surprenante. La preuve qu’un rosé peut être un vrai vin, qui plus est d’une toute belle qualité.
Delicately balanced between fruity and dry. It gave me a glimpse of how sunsets taste.
